code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'./styles/EditarUsuario.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function EditProductForm(_ref){let{name}=_ref;const[editedProduct,setEditedProduct]=useState({name});const goTo=useNavigate();useEffect(()=>{setEditedProduct({name});},[name]);const handleChange=e=>{const{name,value}=e.target;setEditedProduct(prevData=>({...prevData,[name]:value}));};const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const response=await fetch("http://localhost:5000/products/".concat(editedProduct.name),{method:'PUT',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(editedProduct)});if(response.ok){const data=await response.json();setEditedProduct(data);alert('Producto actualizado con éxito');}else{}}catch(error){console.error('Error:',error);}};const handleVolver=()=>{goTo('/listaproductos');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"edit-user-form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleVolver,children:"Volver"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"EDITAR PRODUCTO"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Nombre de producto:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"name",value:editedProduct.name,onChange:handleChange})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Precio:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"price",value:editedProduct.price,onChange:handleChange})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Guardar cambios"})]})]});}export default EditProductForm;
